name: 1989.vim
description: vim color scheme inspired by Taylor Swift
readme: # 1989.vim Maybe the first ever Taylor Swift themed color scheme for vim? ## Basic use: - copy the `/colors/1989.vim` file into your colors directory (generally `~/.vim/colors`, prob different on Windows) - add `colorscheme 1989` to your `~/.vimrc` or test it out inside vim using `:colorscheme 1989` It should work equally well with 256-color terminals and GUI vim. I've tested it mostly with Ruby so far, will hopefully work on improving it for other languages soon!
